name: Ouch！War！/ 破音乱斗
description:
Ouch!War is an IO game that so different from any other IO games. In Ouch!War, you need to shout in order to use the weapon, knockdown your enemy and get the victory by your voice! This game includes 4 playing modes. You can choose to fight alone or team up to fight another team. You can even challenge the strong zombie boss with other players in special map! This is a match about using your voice, the one who can control your voice subtly will be the finally winner! Using the various weapons and buffs, adventurers, release your power inside you by your voice!

Caution: This game needs MICROPHONE!

Features

·Players will control their attacks by their voice. With different ways to shout will you get unexpected happiness.

·Get random boxes and use different abilities. Choose the right abilities to restrict others'.

·Choose your strategy to win. Only one can be the winner among the four players online.

·Play together! Call your friends and have fun shouting together!
